name: Princess of the Moon
description:
**If the camera does not transition properly. Please restart the game.**

A tale about a princess on the moon who became immortal and was exiled to Earth...

~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~

This game is created for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 5 under the theme: Folklore, Myths, Legends. So I decided to create a game based on the character Kaguya Houraisan, who is based on the princess in the Tale of the Bamboo Cutter.
In this game, you'll be progressing through three stages of platforming while learning about the princess of the moon and her story.

Controls:
Left/Right Arrows - Movement
Up/Down Arrows - Moving up and down while climbing
Left Shift - Hold to climb walls
Z - Jump (Hold to jump higher)
X (With Powerup) - Dash

Programming, art, music, sound effects, and story by iceing11.
